sentence: navaṃ pana bhikkhunā santhataṃ kārayamānena dve bhāgā suddhakāḷakānaṃ eḷakalomānaṃ ādātabbā, tatiyaṃ odātānaṃ, catutthaṃ gocariyānaṃ.

navaṃ pana bhikkhunā santhataṃ kārayamānena dve bhāgā suddhakāḷakānaṃ eḷakalomānaṃ ādātabbā, tatiyaṃ odātānaṃ, catutthaṃ gocariyānaṃ.
pali_1: By a monk who is having a new felt rug made, two parts of pure black sheep-wool are to be taken, (and) a third (part) of white, (and) a fourth (part) of muddy brown.

sentence: anādā ce bhikkhu dve bhāge suddhakāḷakānaṃ eḷakalomānaṃ, tatiyaṃ odātānaṃ, catutthaṃ gocariyānaṃ, navaṃ santhataṃ kārāpeyya, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.

meaning: offence requiring confession, offence involving expiation

sentence: anādā ce bhikkhu dve bhāge suddhakāḷakānaṃ eḷakalomānaṃ, tatiyaṃ odātānaṃ, catutthaṃ gocariyānaṃ, navaṃ santhataṃ kārāpeyya, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
pali_1: If a monk, not taking two parts of pure black sheep's hair, (and) a third (part) of white, (and) a fourth (part) of ruddy brown, should cause the making of a new felt rug, this is an offence requiring relinquishment and confession.
